entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
